incompatibleIntegrations.name: nextauth
incompatibleIntegrations.reason: Both provide authentication. Using both will cause conflicts in session management.
incompatibleIntegrations.resolution: Choose either Clerk or NextAuth for authentication, not both.

incompatibleIntegrations.name: auth0
incompatibleIntegrations.reason: Both are complete authentication solutions that will conflict.
incompatibleIntegrations.resolution: Choose either Clerk or Auth0 for authentication.

overlappingFeatures.notes: Supabase and Firebase include their own auth. You may want to disable their auth features if using Clerk.
